page.title: 10FARM SURVEY page 1
page.content: {Warkleigh Barton}is a farm of 166 acres, 5 fields are for pasture, 3 are used for growing crops, 5 fields are used for growing hay or silage. Barley and oats are the crops grown this year. {Animals The animals kept are 4 milking cows, 120 breeding ewes, 200 fat lambs for meat. {Machinery There are 3 tractors. The other farm machinery is; combine, mower, forage harvester, muck spreader,plough, hayturner, hedge trimmer, roller, drags, corn drill. {workers 5 people work full time on the farm and one person works part time.{
